__e: I'm leaving your employ, as I ought to have done when all this started.
If I don't make it here I'll quite the damn force, because what we do... There's nothing else that a cop can do that matters as much as this.
You want me to quit the only thing I've ever wanted to do?
I'm not resigning because I believe I did anything wrong.
I want to come back, and I'm gonna do whatever it takes, and I'm not quitting.
When you're as good, it's something as you are when you can make a difference like you can you just don't quit.
